languages.text: "И где же обычно сияют самые драгоценные жемчужины, Джай", — спросите вы. И я вам отвечу: "В коронах монархов, шерин. В коронах монархов". Ах, {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g}... Когда-то я и мечтать не смела о том, чтоб стать наместником этой вечно рассыпающейся на шестеренки станции. Но теперь, шерин, я почти уверена — с грамотой торгового представителя Джай Хейдари может превратить Футфол в жемчужину среди миров и станций Простора!"

traits.locale_text: "И где же обычно сияют самые драгоценные жемчужины, Джай", — спросите вы. И я вам отвечу: "В коронах монархов, шерин. В коронах монархов". Ах, {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g}... Когда-то я и мечтать не смела о том, чтоб стать наместником этой вечно рассыпающейся на шестеренки станции. Но теперь, шерин, я почти уверена — с грамотой торгового представителя Джай Хейдари может превратить Футфол в жемчужину среди миров и станций Простора!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "'But where do the most precious pearls shine, Jae?' I hear you ask. And my answer is, 'They shine in the crowns of monarchs, shereen, they shine in the crowns of monarchs.' Ah, {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}... There was a time when I could not even have dreamt of becoming Liege of the perpetually crumbling mess that is Footfall. But now... now, shereen, I am almost certain that a merchant's certificate will allow Jae Heydari to turn Footfall into the most lustrous pearl among the worlds and stations of the Expanse!"
languages.original_text: "И где же обычно сияют самые драгоценные жемчужины, Джай", — спросите вы. И я вам отвечу: "В коронах монархов, шерин. В коронах монархов". Ах, {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g}... Когда-то я и мечтать не смела о том, чтоб стать наместником этой вечно рассыпающейся на шестеренки станции. Ah, {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}... There was a time when I could not even have dreamt of becoming Liege of the perpetually crumbling mess that is Footfall. But now... now, shereen, I am almost certain that a merchant's certificate will allow Jae Heydari to turn Footfall into the most lustrous pearl among the worlds and stations of the Expanse!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “‘可最宝贵的珍珠该去哪里发光呢，婕伊？’我听到你这么问我，而我是这么回答的。‘它们会在君主的皇冠上闪闪发光，亲爱的。它们会在君主的皇冠上闪闪发光。’啊，{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}……曾几何时，我甚至都不敢奢望自己能成为落脚港这个烂摊子的总督。可现在……可现在，亲爱的，我几乎可以确信，有了行商执照，婕伊·海达利将会让落脚港天翻地覆，会把它变成科罗努斯扩区所有世界与所有星站中最璀璨的珍珠！”
languages.original_text: "'But where do the most precious pearls shine, Jae?' I hear you ask. And my answer is, 'They shine in the crowns of monarchs, shereen, they shine in the crowns of monarchs.' Ah, {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}... There was a time when I could not even have dreamt of becoming Liege of the perpetually crumbling mess that is Footfall. But now... now, shereen, I am almost certain that a merchant's certificate will allow Jae Heydari to turn Footfall into the most lustrous pearl among the worlds and stations of the Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: “‘可最宝贵的珍珠该去哪里发光呢，婕伊？’我听到你这么问我，而我是这么回答的。‘它们会在君主的皇冠上闪闪发光，亲爱的。它们会在君主的皇冠上闪闪发光。’啊，{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}……曾几何时，我甚至都不敢奢望自己能成为落脚港这个烂摊子的总督。可现在……可现在，亲爱的，我几乎可以确信，有了行商执照，婕伊·海达利将会让落脚港天翻地覆，会把它变成科罗努斯扩区所有世界与所有星站中最璀璨的珍珠！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "'But where do the most precious pearls shine, Jae?' I hear you ask. And my answer is, 'They shine in the crowns of monarchs, shereen, they shine in the crowns of monarchs.' Ah, Footfall... There was a time when I could not even have dreamt of becoming Liege of the perpetually crumbling mess that is Footfall. But now... now, shereen, I am almost certain that a merchant's certificate will allow Jae Heydari to turn Footfall into the most lustrous pearl among the worlds and stations of the Expanse!"

languages.text: «Sé que se está preguntando dónde brillan las perlas más preciosas. Y mi respuesta es: en las coronas de los monarcas, shereen. En las coronas de los monarcas. Ah, {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}... Hubo una época en la que no podría ni haber soñado con convertirme en Señora del desastre en perpetuo peligro de colapso que es Paso. Pero ahora... ¡ahora, shereen, estoy casi convencida de que un certificado mercantil permitirá a Jae Heydari convertir Paso en la perla más lustrosa de los mundos y estaciones de la Extensión!"».
languages.original_text: "'But where do the most precious pearls shine, Jae?' I hear you ask. And my answer is, 'They shine in the crowns of monarchs, shereen, they shine in the crowns of monarchs.' Ah, {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}... There was a time when I could not even have dreamt of becoming Liege of the perpetually crumbling mess that is Footfall. But now... now, shereen, I am almost certain that a merchant's certificate will allow Jae Heydari to turn Footfall into the most lustrous pearl among the worlds and stations of the Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: «Sé que se está preguntando dónde brillan las perlas más preciosas. Y mi respuesta es: en las coronas de los monarcas, shereen. En las coronas de los monarcas. Ah, {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}... Hubo una época en la que no podría ni haber soñado con convertirme en Señora del desastre en perpetuo peligro de colapso que es Paso. Pero ahora... ¡ahora, shereen, estoy casi convencida de que un certificado mercantil permitirá a Jae Heydari convertir Paso en la perla más lustrosa de los mundos y estaciones de la Extensión!
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「『だが、最も貴重な真珠はどこで輝くのだ、ジェイ？』という質問が聞こえてくるようだわ。あたしの答えは『君主の王冠の中で輝くのよ、シャリーン』って感じかしら。ああ、{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}…いつも、いつまでも崩れ続けている混乱した街の領主になるなんて、夢にも思わなかった時期もあったのよ。だけど今は…商人の証明書があれば、あたし、ジェイ・ヘイダリがフットフォールをエクスパンスの惑星やステーションの中で最も輝く真珠に変わることができると、ほとんど確信しているのよ！もちろん、あたしの行く手を阻むヴラダイム型の小さな砂丘はあるけれど…年老いたラクダが若いレイヨウに追いつくことなんてありえないものね」
languages.original_text: "'But where do the most precious pearls shine, Jae?' I hear you ask. And my answer is, 'They shine in the crowns of monarchs, shereen, they shine in the crowns of monarchs.' Ah, {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}... There was a time when I could not even have dreamt of becoming Liege of the perpetually crumbling mess that is Footfall. But now... now, shereen, I am almost certain that a merchant's certificate will allow Jae Heydari to turn Footfall into the most lustrous pearl among the worlds and stations of the Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: 「『だが、最も貴重な真珠はどこで輝くのだ、ジェイ？』という質問が聞こえてくるようだわ。あたしの答えは『君主の王冠の中で輝くのよ、シャリーン』って感じかしら。ああ、{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}…いつも、いつまでも崩れ続けている混乱した街の領主になるなんて、夢にも思わなかった時期もあったのよ。だけど今は…商人の証明書があれば、あたし、ジェイ・ヘイダリがフットフォールをエクスパンスの惑星やステーションの中で最も輝く真珠に変わることができると、ほとんど確信しているのよ！もちろん、あたしの行く手を阻むヴラダイム型の小さな砂丘はあるけれど…年老いたラクダが若いレイヨウに追いつくことなんてありえないものね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "'Doch wo glänzen die wertvollsten Perlen, Jae?', höre ich Euch fragen. Und meine Antwort lautet: 'Sie glänzen in den Kronen von Monarchen, Shereen, sie glänzen in den Kronen von Monarchen.' Ah, {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} ... Es gab Zeiten, da hätte ich nicht einmal davon geträumt, Lehnsherr dieser zerbröckelnden Ruine namens Footfall zu werden. Doch nun ... nun, Shereen, bin ich fast sicher, dass eine Handelslizenz Jae Heydari helfen wird, Footfall in die schimmerndste Perle unter allen Welten und Stationen der Ausdehnung zu verwandeln!"
languages.original_text: "'But where do the most precious pearls shine, Jae?' I hear you ask. And my answer is, 'They shine in the crowns of monarchs, shereen, they shine in the crowns of monarchs.' Ah, {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}... There was a time when I could not even have dreamt of becoming Liege of the perpetually crumbling mess that is Footfall. But now... now, shereen, I am almost certain that a merchant's certificate will allow Jae Heydari to turn Footfall into the most lustrous pearl among the worlds and stations of the Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: "'Doch wo glänzen die wertvollsten Perlen, Jae?', höre ich Euch fragen. Und meine Antwort lautet: 'Sie glänzen in den Kronen von Monarchen, Shereen, sie glänzen in den Kronen von Monarchen.' Ah, {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} ... Es gab Zeiten, da hätte ich nicht einmal davon geträumt, Lehnsherr dieser zerbröckelnden Ruine namens Footfall zu werden. Doch nun ... nun, Shereen, bin ich fast sicher, dass eine Handelslizenz Jae Heydari helfen wird, Footfall in die schimmerndste Perle unter allen Welten und Stationen der Ausdehnung zu verwandeln!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « "Mais où brillent les perles les plus précieuses, Jae ?" me demanderez-vous. Et je vous répondrai : "Sur les couronnes des monarques, shereen." Ah, {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}... À une époque, je n'aurais même pas pu rêver de devenir la suzeraine de ce bazar qui tient encore debout par l'opération de l'Empereur-Dieu. Mais maintenant... maintenant, shereen, je suis presque certaine qu'un certificat de commerce me permettra de faire de Castel la perle la plus précieuse de tous les mondes et de toutes les stations des Étendues ! »
languages.original_text: "'But where do the most precious pearls shine, Jae?' I hear you ask. And my answer is, 'They shine in the crowns of monarchs, shereen, they shine in the crowns of monarchs.' Ah, {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}... There was a time when I could not even have dreamt of becoming Liege of the perpetually crumbling mess that is Footfall. But now... now, shereen, I am almost certain that a merchant's certificate will allow Jae Heydari to turn Footfall into the most lustrous pearl among the worlds and stations of the Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: « "Mais où brillent les perles les plus précieuses, Jae ?" me demanderez-vous. Et je vous répondrai : "Sur les couronnes des monarques, shereen." Ah, {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}... À une époque, je n'aurais même pas pu rêver de devenir la suzeraine de ce bazar qui tient encore debout par l'opération de l'Empereur-Dieu. Mais maintenant... maintenant, shereen, je suis presque certaine qu'un certificat de commerce me permettra de faire de Castel la perle la plus précieuse de tous les mondes et de toutes les stations des Étendues ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "'Peki en değerli inciler en güzel nerede parlar Jae?' diye sorduğunu duyabiliyorum. Yanıtım da şu: 'Hükümdarların taçlarında parlarlar şirinim, hükümdarların taçlarında parlarlar.' {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g}... O sağı solu dökülmeye doymayan enkazın Emîr'i olmayı hayal bile edemezdim. Şimdi ama şirinim, ticaret tasdiknamesinin Jae Heydari'ye, Binliman'ı Enginlik'teki tüm dünyalar ve istasyonlar arasındaki en göz alıcı inciye dönüştürme imkânı vereceğinden emin sayılırım!"
languages.original_text: "'But where do the most precious pearls shine, Jae?' I hear you ask. And my answer is, 'They shine in the crowns of monarchs, shereen, they shine in the crowns of monarchs.' Ah, {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}... There was a time when I could not even have dreamt of becoming Liege of the perpetually crumbling mess that is Footfall. But now... now, shereen, I am almost certain that a merchant's certificate will allow Jae Heydari to turn Footfall into the most lustrous pearl among the worlds and stations of the Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: "'Peki en değerli inciler en güzel nerede parlar Jae?' diye sorduğunu duyabiliyorum. Yanıtım da şu: 'Hükümdarların taçlarında parlarlar şirinim, hükümdarların taçlarında parlarlar.' Ah {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g}. O sürekli sağı solu dökülen enkazın Emîr'i olmayı hayal bile edemezdim eskiden. Şimdi ama şirinim, ticaret sertifikasının Jae Heydari'ye, Binliman'ı Enginlik'teki tüm dünyalar ve istasyonlar içindeki en göz alıcı inciye dönüştürme imkânı vereceğine neredeyse eminim!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
